Erin & Dan

Chicago, IL

2016

We are thrilled to announce our wedding. Please join us on September 17th for an evening of celebration, family, old friends, strong drinks, and dancing. We can't wait to see you there.

RSVP

Reception

We’re pumped to spend an evening with all of our favorite people. We’ll have food to eat, drinks to drinks, great company, and good music to dance to. There may even be a speech or two.

Join us at 6 pm for dinner, drinks, and plenty of dancing.

Getting there

  • Public transportation
    • Take the whatevs bus
    • Or the other bus
  • Driving
    • Parking is somewhat limited nearby, but you can try parking on California. Please don’t park next door!
  • Rideshare
    • Uber or Lyft
    • Cabs exist too
  • Bike
    • Take Divvy!

Attire

Dress your best, but make sure your shoes are compfortable enough to hit the dance floor.

Food and drink

We’ll be serving a full meal of delicious walnut loaf and pea soup. We ask that you supply your own croutons.

Come thirsty, becaue we’ll have lots to drink, including a bourbon cocktail, selection of beer, and the finest wines.

Traveling to Chicago

We spent the bulk of our twenties living in and learning to love the great city of Chicago. Many of our family and friends live right down the road, but if you’re joining us from out of town, we’d love to make a few suggestions for what to do and see while you’re here.

Lodging

We’re lined up a small block of rooms at the HoJo. Reserve a room by Christmas, 1983 to get your spot.

Reserve a room

If you’d rather soak up a little more local flavor, we highly recommend checking out AirBnB.

Chicago AirBnB
